body_html:
In tonight's weekly call we talked about having a potentially incomplete Contribution Guide being better than having none 😄 I added some running text but there are still two (maybe three) open TODOs

  • the label paragraph
  • where to put the purely code cosmetics bit?
  • adding anchor tags to the table of contents at the top?

body:
